it.polito.computervision.gestures

Class AbstractGesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.computervision.gestures.AbstractGesture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gesture
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OneHandGesture, TwoHandGesture

    public abstract class AbstractGesture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Gesture
    Implements the common functionality of a gesture (getters and GestureState update). Concrete implementations will need to implement the Gesture.updateState(List, List) and doReset() methods.
    Author:
    Giovanni Piumatti
